sentences.sContent: She must be very proud of herself.
...she primed herself to new opportunities she may otherwise have overlooked...
...who put herself through the fire of change to completely reinvent herself...
...a 5-year-old beside herself with the thrill of putting together strings of nonsensical words with her best friends...
...Social workers discover that the wife normally tries to take care of her husband herself for as long as she can in order not to use up their life savings...
...she has kept her promise to herself to cut back on her Internet use...

trans.tranOther: used when the woman or girl who performs an action is also affected by it
